Start: ^I am pulled out of my head by the sound of empty tins falling over behind me.
^I look over to see Eduardo, looking worse for wear.
^His eyes are red, the usual confidance in his step gone.
^"Sorry. I've never been one to hide how I feel."

c: ^] "I'm actually surprised how much Timothy's panic attack is affecting you."
^[Eduardo] "Yeah, sure. That's it. Cuz I'm just <flow>soooo</flow> empathetic."
^He laughes some more, but even I can tell its fake.

Start: ^Ask if he wants to talk about it

c: ^] "Do you, uh, want to talk about it?"
^I ask almost out of a habit, despite my own wreck of emotions.
^[Eduardo] "Hehe, yeah, talk about myself. That's just all I ever do, ain't it?"
^Eduardo forces a smile, but his energy fades quickly.

g-0: ^, you shouldn't have to deal with two people's broken minds in one day."
^"Besides, I, uh, came in here becuase I thought it was empty. I just want to be left alone right now."
^"So, uh, see ya at dinner or whatever."
^I almost feel a bit better knowing I'm not the only one having a bad day becuase of this. @Commiseration relieved a small amount of depression.
